name: Santa Tattoo Designer Girl - Design & Artist Game
name_original: Santa Tattoo Designer Girl - Design & Artist Game
description:
Have you dreamed of playing amazing girl tattoo designer game? OXO Apps presents Santa Tattoo design game on the eve of Christmas. Get this Fabulous Tattoo Design Studio & draw awesome tattoo.

Now you can! this amazing tattoo maker app lets you do just that! Choose your character to draw tattoo art using fresh ink in your tattoo making machines and start making tattoos from amazing tattoo collection. This Tattoo design game is specially designed for Girls & Kids.

FEATURES
- Try out the Freestyle Mode tattoo colouring
- 35 awesome tattoo designs
- Specially for great America, Brazil Tattoo Customers

- Impress unique tattoos
- Wide range of textures
- Awesome Graffiti Design
- Floral Tattoo Design
- Tribal Tattoo Design
- Fantasy Tattoo Design
- Show your creativity to others
- Free forever Game

Start your day with tattoo maker app and start making tattoos inspired by your horoscope! This tattoo maker app will let you become an amazing tattoo artist of your town. Tattoo designing is all about your creations and tattoo yourself. Try this amazing tattoo maker app with your friends, or just keep drawing tattoos for yourself using this tattoo studio.

Get this amazing tattoo maker app to tattoo yourself and ink away all you want to do in our tattoo shop!
